ygData.subject: RE: dot's?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes you can recast which will refresh and if you and the necro were the same lvl he would win. Xakthan Lord of Shadows Follower of the Crimson Knights
ygData.messageBody:
Yes you can recast which will refresh and if you and the necro were the same
lvl he would win.


Xakthan
Lord of Shadows
Follower of the Crimson Knights

<--- Enigma --->
http://members.door.net/enigma

-----Original Message-----
From: ken satchell "flash-net & nikken distrubter" [mailto:ken4p@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 11:15 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] dot's?

From: "ken satchell \"flash-net & nikken distrubter\"" <ken4p@...>

sicken
tainted breath
infectious cloud
affliction
envenomed breath
on these shaman dot's can you cast any of them multiple times before the
previous casting is worn off of the mob? or would it just restart the spell?
or would the necro win?
Ken
